website_summaries.verdict: Between the turntable, customizable tracks, and working crane, there is more than enough to keep train fanatics entertained for hours on end.
pros: Features 4 different track layouts to fit your space
Includes 3 tank engines and a helicopter

customer_reviews.title: Large and can't be taken down easily
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy playing with this and has made a fine addition to our wooden track collection. I do like the various configurations and the kids just like racing trains up and down the platform. The reason why it's 4 stars and not 5 is because it cannot be taken apart easily for storage. Some of the connections like the sheds and the crane are semi-permanent where the only way to take them apart is with a screwdriver and patience. Be prepared for this to become part of the furniture in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Brent V

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but doesn’t keep their interest.
customer_reviews.text: Items are good quality, but unfortunately it’s kind of boring. The lower track doesn’t interact at all with the ramp tracks or the upper base. To use the lower track, the kids must push the cars around climbing around/reaching under the base. There’s no track display that links the lower track to the ramp. Kind of disappointing. My kids (3, 4 and 5) played with this for all of 10 minutes and haven’t touched it since. We bought this and the hot wheels super garage and by far the hot wheels wins.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: My 4y/o son loves this track set. The fact that it has Cranky is the center of his joy. I suggest buying an extra track pack and extra trains as well. Also the rechargeable batteries and charging dock are a must. He and his cousin (5 y/o girl) went all day playing with this and didnt even ask for the phones. I'd give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Yushawan Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Very lg piece, can use any size Thomas trains. Very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate in Thomas the trains of any size storage and play center. You can use all size Thomas trains on this. Is a very LG piece so keep that in mind. Also recommend Thomas High Sky Jump which is also a very LG piece. Be ready to take up a room with these two pieces. Very well made. The twins actually caught their dad playing with it. Good purchase definitely great price on Amazon. Would definitely recommend to anyone with little ones that eat, sleep, watch, read and dream Thomas the train.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy. Was easy to snap all together and my son loves this Christmas present- especially since he can use multiple different Thomas sets with this one track. As a parent, I really love that it can also store all his trains when not in use. Well worth the money. He has played with this every day since he got it on Christmas morning (today is Jan 21.)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It`s a large piece.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. I don`t know who likes it the most, me or my 3 year old grandson. The smallest configuration we could get the track down to was 2 1/2 feet to 3 ft or so. It takes up a good amount of space. Lots of fun how we set it up here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set, universal for all Thomas trains
customer_reviews.text: Cute set, tracks are universal for all of the Thomas trains! (Even minis) easy to put together, pieces snap together, minimal stickers. Comes with adaptors to attach to other Thomas track sets
customer_reviews.author: Holly B

customer_reviews.title: Thomas and Friends super station
customer_reviews.text: Bought this playset for my 5 yo who likes it ok. The entire track is not functional for the motorized trains. As you can see in the video the trains go around the outside of the super station. When they are rerouted to go in the tower they just hit the sides and spin wheels. The tower is good for the push trains only. Includes One motorized train, helicopter, mini push train, and a full size push train. Definitely overpriced imo but seems very sturdy. It doesn't fall apart easy which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Daphnern

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but still neat
customer_reviews.text: Only giving 2 stars because the train set arrived bent on both sides. The shipping box appeared to be fine so I didn't realize that it was bent till Christmas and no way I'd sent it back once my son seen it. He has autism and is obsessed with trains. It's a great set, very large but the trains fall off the sides most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: lakon

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loves this! It really does ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this! It really does connect with all 4 different kinds of Thomas and friends trains.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with wooden tracks - At All
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything it promises to be and the kids love it. However, it was created for Thomas the train and it isn’t computable with any of the traditional wooden tracks. I completely understand that this set is mad of plastic - but there really should have been SOME thought as to how to link this to existing tracks. I honestly wish we’d never bought it as it takes up so much room. I thought we’d be able to get rid of the train table and just use this, but as they don’t connect, I’m now stuck with two completely separate systems. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: MWD

customer_reviews.title: Great for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grandson at Christmas. He loves trains and building--so this should make him happy. It was shipped almost immediately and arrived quickly. This is very large when set up. Great seller
customer_reviews.author: Adeline317

customer_reviews.title: Super Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so wasn't sure if this was going to be great or not. Some of the trackmaster sets are flimsy and a difficult to connect for a 4 year old. This Super Station is awesome! Sturdy, easy to use, easy to connect, and so fun! Wish all the trackmaster tracks were like this! The trackmaster trains, minis, and push alongs/take n plays/adventure trains ALL run on these tracks!! It came with connectors for wooden as well. This thing has been connected up to trackmaster, old trackmaster (we had adaptors), wooden, hot wheels jumps, stuffies invasion, & had a lego track running around it. Hours of imaginative and fun play!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for Christmas a few months after he turned 5. He’s never been a fanatic about Thomas, or trains in general. I was having trouble finding a “big” gift for him. I thought this looked cool, and it was a great price. He loved it more than I dreamed it would! He loves all the places to put all of the trains (we got some extra ones). I thought he may be too old for this, but I was wrong. It’s also bigger than I thought it would be. It was very exciting for him to see this on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: MommyRN

customer_reviews.title: the Thomas engine that came with it rides the track pretty well, but sometimes flies off the track when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, who loves it. I'm not as impressed with it....the Thomas engine that came with it rides the track pretty well, but sometimes flies off the track when heading down the declined section of track. The other motorized engine i bought for it (which is also the fisher-price thomas & friends brand) flies off the track every freaking time. I find this annoying. Also, the incline/decline supports don't stay attached very well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The best thing is that the track can to rearranged to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Thomas The Train Lover's dream. My nephew is 4 yrs. old and just stood there in amazement, as he stood motionless when we unveiled the train set. When to hug him and felt his heart beating rapidly with excitement, as he stood there saying, " Thomas, Thomas" and calling out all the names of the trains in the set. My nephew played with this set for several, uninterrupted, hours and when he brought the set home, the playing time extended beyond that. I truly felt appreciated. He loves this set. The best thing is that the track can to rearranged to fit a large or confirmed small space. An awesome purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta's CowGirl

customer_reviews.title: This was worth every penny. It’s huge and comes ...
customer_reviews.text: This was worth every penny. It’s huge and comes with a lot. My 5 year old, and my other boys play with this a lot. It has adapters that connect it to wooden track so my son can build a track all over the room. And they can play with all of their sizes of Thomas trains on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N

customer_reviews.title: Great for 7y/o
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I should take some responsibility for not paying full attention to the dimensions of the packaging - THIS IS HUGE! To travel with it, we had to take it out of the box and pack the pieces into a suitcase; the set took up the entire suitcase. Aside from the size, it was a huge hit for the little ones in my family (ages 6 & 7). The set also connects to other track sets so they are able to change the design daily. The trains for this track are a little small, however this does not seem to impact the kids fun at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of plastic, and honestly it's not that interesting. There are other sets, in particular we love the glow in the dark one, that is far more interesting to play with. I wish I didn't buy this, it's a lot of money, doesn't hold interest all that well, and it's so much plastic. I have a 4 year old who LOVES thomas and a 1.5 year old, both boys. To me, this is just big junk.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dip

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome track, just was I was looking for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome track, just was I was looking for my Son. He loves it, and the ability to change are a big plus. The pieces are easy to put together and take apart and the trains designed for this track stay on very well. The only thing is that even though there is an attachment for the wooden train tracks, the trains built for this track to not work as well on the wooden track, which was a source of frustration from my son, but he loves it nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Kay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Thomas Set
customer_reviews.text: In a word, WOW! This set is amazing. It's also really big, so be sure you have the space for this. It connects to all track sizes and you can play with all the Thomas trains on this set, Mini, Thomas Wood, Thomas trackmaster. It comes with extra track and connectors, so you can mix the track that this set comes with , with your existing wood or Trackmaster track. We gave this to our 4 year old boy, for his birthday, and has not stopped playing with it. Really amazing set.
customer_reviews.author: AdKat

customer_reviews.title: Huge Fun. Seriously....it’s huge.
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. It is so much fun especially if you have other tracks to connect to it to make a whole world. Ours is currently taking up our whole living room! Two negatives: This thing is HUGE (as tall as my three year old) which is why I’m not sure if it is “giftable” and I didn’t give it full stars in that category. Ours arrived in a very plain cardboard box... so the kids were more confused than excited when they opened it. One side note is that I got it for $54 around Christmas. It was well worth that price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old absolutely loves this. It has cranky. Take and play, wooden AND track master AND minis work on this track... It comes with trains and Harold... It has a train turn table... Racing possibilities.... This is the best that I think they'll ever come out with. I don't see how you could improve on this!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina89

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known this wouldn’t come in a box with the pictures and description on it like you can buy at the store. It is a Christmas gift for a 3 year old and he’s not going to get nearly as excited by a cardboard box with just words on it when he opens it. Other wise it’s fine, damage free and all the parts seem to be there.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Casto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The Thomas Super Station is awesome. My little one loves Thomas. This keeps him busy and entertained. It’s so fun hearing him play and make believe to be the different engines. This was easy to assemble and comes with some transition tracks If you have other tracks. We have several different sets of tracks and were able to add them to the Super Station.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Flemings

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Thomas lover
customer_reviews.text: For $59 we just coyld NOT pass up this deal. We love this toy. I purchased it for our big reveal on Christmas morning and it was a HUGE hit with my two year old. It has been a few weeks later and it gets played with on the daily. He loves the battery operated trains (trackmaster) but my favorite are the metal trains as we find they are much quieter :). The set was easy to put together but it is really large. The plastic is sturdy and my two year has a lot of fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Lent

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this, he can spend hours at a time playing with this & I can too. Definitely recommend for any Thomas the Train fan. I purchased this for my son’s 4th birthday, so glad I did. It is a bit pricey, but totally worth it, you have enough tracks to build different models with. So it’s like you’re getting 4 track sets in 1.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way! Love this!!! My son is having a ball this Christmas morning. Got it!!! Only problem my delivery driver tried to steal it prior to arrival. Missing outside trains but talking with Amazon about it. Not amazons fault this thing is amazing. Used YouTube to assemble. Great instructions though
customer_reviews.author: ralphanee

customer_reviews.title: I can WFH now thanks to this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my son has been stuck at home for 4 months due to Covid-19. Poor kid is so bored and won’t let me work. He was so happy just to see the box! Set up was pretty easy. The instructions were simple and the parts were all labeled. That is super rare! It took us about 20 minutes to set up. I love the fact we can store most of his trains on there. I wish it folded for storage but you can always take it apart. It’s not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Soo C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! However, it takes up half of his room. Lol. So, buyer beware that this thing is HUGe and bigger than my 3 year old. It is a great buy though and worth the money. He loves it!! I do wish the 2 ramps were a little sturdier. We have to keep putting them back together because they keep coming undone, but that could be because he is a little rough with it. Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ... son for Christmas and to say he is in love with it is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for Christmas and to say he is in love with it is an understatement. I am so glad he is able to play with all the different thomas trains on this ONE station. Anyone who has purchased Thomas the trains knows there's about 5 different series of trains that you typically can't play with them together as they use different tracks. This you can use the mini's, the trackmasters, the adventure trains, THE WOODEN TRAINS. it's the best thing these Thomas folks have come up with. My kid can't stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Amazing layout Thomas Trackmaster!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, agree with everyone about this is a MUST buy for who's train fan! My son who is 2 years old and love it so much. Yep, gonna to buy Trackmaster trains etc.. Important is to compare the prices between Amazon and eBay. Sometimes they have lowest price.. As you see these amazing photos by everyone which it is same. Better grab when it is hit lower price since this is normally price about over $100.. I got it as like new.
customer_reviews.author: HMoM

customer_reviews.title: Great black friday deal
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a great price for Black Friday. The set is HUGE. It's a Christmas gift for my nephew, who loves Thomas. The tracks are compatible with several different types of Thomas train cars and can connect to other style track systems with the included adapters. We can't wait to see our nephew lose his mind on Christmas morning when he sees it.
customer_reviews.author: Yakbeard

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: It's a GREAT set for sure! I got it on sale and my 4 year old LOVES it! Not much else to say! If this is your first purchase of this type of set, I would get a smaller set first (I have several smaller ones) to see if you are willing to put in the work, but, all in all, it was easier to set up than the smaller ones, but, still requires attention depending on your kid's age. Well worth the $89!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: My 3 Year Old Son Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his third birthday and he absolutely loves it. He has been playing with it non stop since! It was easy to put together and the motorized trains go great with this and don’t get stuck around corners like they do on the wooden tracks. My only complaint would be the box it came in wasn’t colorful or appealing and didn’t have a picture of the item itself so besides the Thomas logo he didn’t know what was in the box until we opened it. Great gift for any train loving kiddos! Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great "big" toy purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Be prepared to make some room in your house for this because it's large but it is so much fun. It's great that it comes with several train engines, since we didn't have very many. It came with several train track pieces and can be configured different ways. The directions easily explained different ways to put it together. It has several connector pieces so that you can connect old/other kids of tracks to this.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The train doesn't have enough power to make it up the track to the station. When the train is in the station, it get stuck on the tracks. This is poorly made. My son tried playing with it a few times, but due to it not working properly he lost interest rather quickly. Waste of money and space!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa payson

customer_reviews.title: Super Station - Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: If your child LOVES Thomas the Train like mine they will LOVE this Super Station. It has been over a year and he is still playing with it even today. There are so many options and configurations it has held up his interested even through the picky toddler years.
customer_reviews.author: heavenly137

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It is BIG. I knew the measurements, but didn't quite realize how big it was until I had it assembled in my family room, LOL! My 3 year old plays with it constantly. I love that there are different ways to assemble the track and it comes with a good amount of track. It is super cool to keep all his Minis hanging from the edges too. He likes to put them down the slopes in a giant train and have them crash at the end. Definitely worth $80-$90
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOY FOR YOUR THOMAS THE TRAIN FAN!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 4 year old's birthday two months ago and he could hardly wait to help build it! It's HUGE so you'll need an large open space for it to stay. Over the months we've tried a couple different layouts and have customized the station with pieces from other Trackmaster sets. The main section is very study and can take the weight of a toddler leaning against it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: G Family

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge.
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than it looks. It’s huge! Probably the size of his entire train table. It’s nice because it comes with pieces that you can attach wooden trains to. For some reason the Thomas the train has a hard time going up (we built it just like the picture) but has no problem going down. Not disappointed for the $40 I spent on it but wouldn’t pay $99.
customer_reviews.author: Raychel

customer_reviews.title: Massive
customer_reviews.text: This was a 2017 Christmas present for my grandson. I couldn't believe how big it is! I was very pleased. Needless to say, he was very excited! Plenty of designated areas to store everything neat and tidy. I did good buying this. It's still set up in his room. He still enjoys playing with it. Who knows....maybe he'll be a railroad engineer someday!
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: Train-loving kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of independent playtime clocked in this in only two weeks. It wasn’t bad to assemble, my four year old loves it, and there’s plenty of track to encourage him to create his own path. My only complaint is that it takes up a decent size space, even without tracks, but that’s also a positive for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3 to 5 year-olds
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift for my almost 5 year-old twin grandsons. They LOVE it. It's big enough for them to play with either standing or sitting on the floor, and complex enough for them to stay entertained for a long time. It works with their Thomas Trains and other kids' trains.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome train set
customer_reviews.text: My kids love thomas and playing with the little trains. This set is really nice in that it allows all of them to play together, and it gives them a tons of playing area. The only down side is that with the legs on the track leading off becomes weak and with any kind of force break apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DiCenzo

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, pain in *** to keep the tracks together
customer_reviews.text: My son is your standard 3 year old and maybe he's just a bit rough but the tracks just won't stay together when he's playing. And then there are many extra tracks for the different types of trains, so I have those in his closet. Overall, it was really easy to put together and he has enjoyed it very much, but I am kind of wishing I would have got a train table and glued the tracks down.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My little one has a great time playing with this however does not stay together ...
customer_reviews.text: My little one has a great time playing with this however does not stay together the pieces come apart and even when you first put it together the two sides don’t quite fit right... We whelmed up just taking the side pieces off and he plays with the top and bottom middle section .... flimsy for the price
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest or best in length but gets a reaction
customer_reviews.text: Huge (tall and wide) but lacking track length and stability under the downward ramps. I mean, it is a toddler toy.... Come on! My son loved it at first but sorry of lost interest because I had to keep fixing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Consider buying damaged
customer_reviews.text: This kind of was a pain to build and it did not stay together long but I just wanted to leave a review, I ordered a “damaged” box set. The pieces came in different packages in the box, but literally nothing wrong w the box and we saved 30$ ! Well with the buy the parts and instructions were in the box, that’s all that mattered ! If you don’t mind taking the risk for a “damaged” item, do it. I saved money on a brand new item !
customer_reviews.author: Sandy V Pathammavong

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I expected, but once built, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Although this product was twice the size I expected, (it's huge!) it is really pretty neat. All three sizes of trains work on this station and there's lots of storage for them too. Also there are adapters for the wooden track so super large systems are possible. Great set to set up races.
customer_reviews.author: H. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but nice trackmaster set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set that made my son very happy on Christmas! Santa had no trouble assembling either! I will say for the cost, the lack of trains is a bit annoying... only 3! Thank goodness we already have too many trackmaster trains, otherwise it would have looked terribly disappointing and nothing like the commercials that sold our son on it.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline gomersall

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. He is 19 months an he loves to play with it an race the trains down the down hill slope. He also like to see his hot wheels go down the tracks. The assembly was easy. This does take up a good bit of space so before buying make sure you have the room. It probably takes up about the same amount of space as a decent sized coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel stallard

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with it.Three stars is for the ridiculous price
customer_reviews.text: I don’t just like this I give it three stars because it is just another Thomas sat in a different package with the high-priced tag. But I have been putting off buying my child a large place up for Christmas for many years now and to be honest it is his turn to feel Santa magic. He is going to be so excited to get this. I am not going to be so excited picking up the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Erin Maniscalco

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Tracks are kind of rough on sides for your hands when connecti ng/disconnecting. Other than this, it is awesome. Presentation- the box that arrived here was in plain brown cardboard with print, unlike the glossy thick colorful boxes you see in pics. Items inside are A+. My toddler loves this; he won’t play with anything else lll
customer_reviews.author: G. Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: A MUST For Any Trainiac!
customer_reviews.text: My little Trainiac was super excited to wake up and find his new Super Station assembled and waiting for play! Assembly was simple, the parts clicked together easily enough for an adult but securely enough that a 3 year old can not break it down with ease. This was definitely a score!
customer_reviews.author: Leslee White

customer_reviews.title: The best gift!
customer_reviews.text: Have plenty of room! But this has been THE BEST gift for my little boy! It has several different set ups, including a space saving one. It has a conversion track piece to use with the wooden tracks as well. It holds almost 100 trains! You can use all of the thomas series- motorized, wooden, mini's...tons of fun & lots of imagination your little one can do!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Neat but wish the 2 upper decks were more functional ...
customer_reviews.text: Neat but wish the 2 upper decks were more functional. They don’t allow a train to travel automatically through them, so they don’t get used by my almost 3 yr/o very much - he prefers to watch and help the trains through the parts that go around the outter section of the lower deck down the tracks that we made loops out of so they can keep traveling.
customer_reviews.author: KrisSquared

customer_reviews.title: Fun and exciting
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old received this for his birthday and he was so excited. It took a little while to put together but instructions were easy to read. It can be assembled many different ways which keeps it fun. My son loves the fact that we can race trains and I love that I can add on the thomas track that he already had.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Austin

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Santa gift for my daughter for Christmas... It was very easy to put together despite tge MANY pieces it came with... But let me warn those of you with limited space...this thing is BIG and takes up a lot of room...my number 1 complaint with this is I think the upper deck is BORING...and apparently so does my daughter..who is 6..!! There is so much more featurws that could have been added..like some music.. Train noises..etc...Also the trains almost ALWAYS run off the track...not worth the 90 bucks in my opinion...
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: When on sale this thing is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son lost his mind when he saw this thing. We love track master engines and that this came with adapters to hook to our wooden railway set too. An expensive toy but it really did make his birthday special.
customer_reviews.author: Stupid People are Annoying

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: If your son or daughter into Thomas and friends this is a great for them, my son loves it so much plus get them a few extra trains to play with due to it on brings a couple of characters with the set, but all in all, very worth your value of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Aldana

customer_reviews.title: Kids can't stop playing with this!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy for any kid who loves trains or Thomas. I even had fun putting it together. Line anything with a lot of parts it takes a while to set up and put all the stickers on but it was well worth it. You can set the tracks up in a few different patterns per the instructions or you can get creative and come up with your own. Definitely a toy both our boys love playing with.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! My nephew is little over 2 and he is obsessed with trains, so I thought this would be perfect for him. Every toy I would get him, he would lose interest in couple of days, but this one lasted a month.
customer_reviews.author: David Kim

customer_reviews.title: It is a very sturdy toy also compared to most toys similar to this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it! It is a very sturdy toy also compared to most toys similar to this. 6 months and it has been moved several time and nothing has broken on it. I am very please and recommend as this is a great toy for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay on Track
customer_reviews.text: Was able to get this item half price. My great nephew really loves this item and plays with all of his Thomas & Friends trains on the tracks. It is a big item but well worth the self entertainment hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle V Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it but from an adult perspective it could have had more function and better design/usefulness for the upper half
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Limited functionality from the upper part of this toy. My son likes it but from an adult perspective it could have had more function and better design/usefulness for the upper half.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Pommeranz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My little boy his so in love with his new Thomas Station. It came with everything in the box and the instructions were very very easy to read and I was able to put it together in less than 20 minute. Very durable product and its like having a real live train station in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Basco

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea, girl will like it too.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my friend’s daughter, she is 3 and she’s very enjoy assembling it with his father thou my friend says the instruction is not very clear. But they finish assembling around 30mins. It comes with a very big box which is ideal for gifting to others. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: but it works great and keeps him occupied
customer_reviews.text: My two year old LOVES this. Granted, he's a little younger than the suggested years so he does need help when Thomas gets stuck, etc, but it works great and keeps him occupied. He likes helping rearrange the tracks to make different paths and watching the trains go by themselves. It really is a great toy for any Thomas lover
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Huge and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son is so happy! I have been looking for a toy to hold his attention for a long time. This is his favorite thing to play with by far. Every day he asks to play with his trains. We added a few more track sets and it is epic! I wish all track master sets had these type of tracks. They work with every kind of train.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine G

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: It was time consuming to put together, but overall I’d say it is worth the money. We got it on Black Friday for $39.99, so I feel like it was a steal. My son absolutely loves it. I love that it also provides a space to store all of his trains.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves trains. It is a little big but we have space and love it. Get the adapters to add the wooden track. He plays with this everyday even if the tracks are not added on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for a 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This was actually easy to put together--my 3 year old grandson did most of the work with me just directing him to the right pieces. He had hours of fun with it--and his one year old bother played with the trains on the back side! Great activity for visiting grandmother over Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome new track master tracks design for sure sturdier and real easy to remember set up. Looks complicated but after you build it it’s easy to install back up anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son is a HUGE train fan and he is absolutely in LOVE with this set. Also all the kids that come over just gravitate to it. I've had a couple of moms asking where to get it. Its an amazing set and I don't see it getting old anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Thomas lovers - it’s huge
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t actually realize how big it is.. you need plenty of room. My son loves it. Only disadvantage is the tip section you can’t use trains on which is a shame. A ramp would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Little nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.text: He played with it for hours at my house, and absolutely loved it. Used the train till it ran out of batteries and wanted them replaced right away!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G

customer_reviews.title: Thomas Rules!! Chugginton  Drools!
customer_reviews.text: Fun!@Fun!!Anddid I mention Fun? 3year old loves it.Refuses to go to school because of it. Buy plenty of trackmaster engines and a few minis to play with it and your all set they will never put it down. Also join to other trackmaster sets for more thrills and triple the action!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: This item is very big, my daughter enjoys it ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is very big, my daughter enjoys it but we have to clear out a fairly large amount of space and then take it down as soon as she's done playing with it so we can move on to the next toy. All but the main piece fit into a tall Sterilite storage bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great set! You WILL want to read and keep the instructions as there is A LOT of assembly for both the tower and train tracks themselves. Our son still plays with his (after about a year) and it's still in great shape. Just have to keep the instructions in the event he wants a different setup.
customer_reviews.author: Todd25

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this super station.Easy to set up and able to combine with regular track and wooden track.Perfect gift for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it I don't always give him all ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it I don't always give him all the track because it takes up so much room and he always wants to move it to another room . but even just the station part he enjoys with it had sound and lights on it lve imagination play but mom likes stimulating sounds and lights also when we play together
customer_reviews.author: R. DENGER

customer_reviews.title: Nice for kids who love to push trains but build track
customer_reviews.text: The track that comes with this is huge. It could easily take up an entire room. It is hard for little kids to put together due to the elevation and need for supports. My kids don't use the track only the main unit and they are happy with it. They are 2 and 4.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son got this for Christmas and is obsessed. He loves playing with it and setting it up. The trains move really fast and do fall off the track a lot, but he doesn’t care.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It's Big.😊
customer_reviews.text: It'seems BIG! Because it is big! It only lasted few days till my dog got hold of the parts, and decided it needs to betaken down. But the boys seems to enjoy it for few days before it's out of commission.
customer_reviews.author: David Chen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old is so in love with this. We purchased it as a Santa present and he was mighty excited when he woke up on Christmas to see this. He wouldn't leave it and refused to open his other presents lol. He didn't leave it for days. He's a tough little boy and it has withstood him very well. Perfectly built and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Werewolf2020

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old who loves trains. He loves playing with it but isn’t ready for the track system that goes with it. So we put the tracks up and will bring them back out when he’s older. You get a lot for the price so it is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BritnieHope

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool, Takes A Minute to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: My son has a very short attention span so he isn’t a huge fan of this. It takes a minute to set things up the way you want them. Once you do though, it is very cool! I think this would be perfect for a child who is obsessed with trains. My son likes them, but isn’t crazy about them, therefore isn’t as interested.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Henman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, wouldn't pay more than $50ish
customer_reviews.text: At the price I paid for this ($49), this is a great toy. My kids love it and I love that it can connect to the wooden tracks they already have so I don't have to worry about dealing with two different incompatible track systems. Lots of entertainment for both my 4yo and my 7yo.
customer_reviews.author: Ayslinn

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Found this on a special deal so can’t beat that. Set went together easy and can stand up to rough play
customer_reviews.author: “Hold my juicebox”

customer_reviews.title: First of all, assembly takes a while. I ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, assembly takes a while. I have 5 small children and this rarely gets played with. Our toddler climbs on it more than he plays with it. The track is also not compatible with the Thomas track that we already had.
customer_reviews.author: REBEKAH H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome train toy!
customer_reviews.text: I was MORE THAN IMPRESSED with this item!! My 2 1/2 year old Grandson loves it and it is now his favorite toy!! What a great value! Very study and comes with so many accessories. Highly recommend this toy for any young train lover in your family. Our Grandson was just screaming...”AWESOME”!! He nailed it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: Little guy in the house is an avid Thomas the Train collector in all guises. Gifted on birthday. Super huge hit....”I wished for this and my dream came true!” Friends love as well!
customer_reviews.author: An Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: The box was a little plain,but after the station was put together it is awsome.my son who is 3 plays with it all the time,and if you have extra pieces of track you can build them in for loads of thomas fun.
customer_reviews.author: William Reap

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Huge... looks exactly as advertised! My nephew was so happy and excited. It definitely will keep a child occupied for hours, days, weeks.. lol
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Super station
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when this went on sale but it seems my 5 year old and 4 yr old are growing out of thomas it is just collecting dust from chriatmas they preffer playmobil and imaginext but it did come it timely matter no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FOR TRAIN LOVERS
customer_reviews.text: If you have a child train lover, do not hesitate on this. Hours and hours of playtime with this purchase. It’s pretty big so make sure you have enough space for it. If you set up all the tracks, you may need 6ft of space 😬
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Kim

customer_reviews.title: Product is perfect! Just shipping had a tiny problem
customer_reviews.text: Overall the item was exactly what I wanted for my boys they pulled out there big bin of tracks and are having so much fun. The only con I have is with the shipping. Not only was my package delivered late it looks like the box was dropped and it ended up bending the big yellow part in the center on one side. It was bad enough to not be usable but it's a gift for my kid. I would like it to be handled with more care.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old grandson loves this. Good quality. The only negative is that it's not a toy you can easily put up and take down frequently. It takes up a substantial amount of floor space, so you pretty much will need to have a room where it can be left up for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Benline

customer_reviews.title: Universal Thomas train set for everything!
customer_reviews.text: This set is compatible with all of the Thomas train set types. There is a considerable amount of storage space available, and the track fits together very tight and stays connected while using it. I purchased it as a "used: very good" condition item, and received a brand new set that had never been opened. This also comes with adapters for the wooden and older style track master tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Nolan

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Thomas & Friends Super Station
product_meta.description: NOW KIDS CAN SET FRIENDSHIP IN MOTION AND IMAGINE AND PLAY OUT ADVENTURES WITH THOMAS & FRIENDS ADVENTURES, TRACKMASTER, MINIS AND WOODEN RAILWAY ENGINES ALL ON THE SAME TRACK SET! THIS MULTI-SYSTEM TRACK SET WITH 3 LEVELS OF PLAY INCLUDES THOMAS, PERCY, JAMES AND HAROLD. IN ADDITION TO BEING ABLE TO USE MOST THOMAS ENGINES, MULTIPLE CONFIGURATIONS ALLOW FOR LAYOUTS THAT CAN FIT ANY SPACE IN THE HOME. THE LEGS CAN EVEN BE REMOVED TO CREATE A MICRO-LAYOUT FOR SMALLER SPACES! HOLDS OVER 100 ENGINES AND FEATURES OVER 35 FEET / 10 METERS OF TRACK, AND FEATURES ICONIC LOCATIONS INCLUDING TIDMOUTH SHEDS, BRENDAM DOCKS, KNAPFORD STATION, THE SODOR STEAMWORKS, THE DIESELWORKS, BLUE MOUNTAIN QUARRY AND THE SSRC WITH HAROLD’S HELIPAD. THERE ARE ALSO CARGO PIECES, ADAPTER PIECES TO CONNECT TO OTHER PLAYSETS, TWO RACETRACKS, FLOOR PLAY AND MORE! FUN FEATURES INCLUDE CRANKY THE CRANE WITH A CRANE THAT CAN BE RAISED, LOWERED, AND ATTACHED TO A CARGO LIFT THAT CAN BE USED TO RAISE CARGO AND ENGINES; AND A TURNTABLE COMPLETE WITH A STOP-TRACK LEVER TO HALT TRACKMASTER ENGINES WHILE YOUR LITTLE ENGINEER CHANGES DIRECTION. THE LEGS AND LOCATIONS FEATURE TUNNELS, AND THERE ARE AREAS FOR CARGO STORAGE, TOO. ADDITIONAL ENGINES AND PLAYSETS SOLD SEPARATELY AND SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY. IT’S THE ULTIMATE THOMAS & FRIENDS PLAYSET!
feature_bullets: Works with Thomas & Friends Adventures, TrackMaster, MINIS and Wooden Railway engines (additional engines sold separately)
Comes with Thomas & Friends TrackMaster Thomas, and his friends Thomas & Friends Adventures Percy, Thomas & Friends MINIS James, plastic Harold
Multiple configurations of layouts to fit into any space
Remove legs for Micro layouts to fit small spaces
Holds over 100 engines (sold separately and subject to availability)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,436 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
